plot: Toby connects with a young faith healer whose miraculous gift has put her life in jeopardy.

After Toby (Craig Olejnik) witnesses a young woman (Michelle Adams) revive a badly injured baby, he feels a strong kinship and curiosity about her gift. Like his own channeling powers, it's both a blessing, when she can heal someone, and a curse when she can't.—Shaftesbury Films
